channel.title: Castle Wars
channel.description:
[center] [b]Git Repository[/b] [url=https://github.com/ThomasPapp/2006-Castle-Wars]Castle Wars Repository[/url]
[b]Introduction[/b] So I'm remaking the full Castle Wars minigame for my remake. I thought since it's a big minigame and I don't think but maybe a few people have actually remade it [i]fully[/i] that I would make a development thread on it. I'll also be posting a git repository, meaning it will be released once it's finished.
All information is gotten from the OSRS wiki found [url=http://2007.runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Castle_Wars]here[/url].
[b]Progress[/b]
The red color means the feature has not yet been started. The orange color means the feature has been started and is under construction. The green color means the feature has been finished.
[u][b]Waiting Room:[/b][/u] - Zamorak - Saradomin - Guthix portal - If wearing god item, change into the correct NPC depending on the portal you entered - Correct interface - Correct wait time - Can only bring in combat items - Can't wear any cape or head gear unless it's the cloak and hood for your team - [i]More to come![/i]
[b]Media[/b] [i]Coming soon![/i] [/center]

item.title: Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

arham 4:

All I see in your github is an empty MinigameData class…

Yea, I uploaded that last night. I’m redoing the system.

Read full topic

item.title: Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[center]
Git Repository
Castle Wars Repository

Introduction
So I’m remaking the full Castle Wars minigame for my remake. I thought since it’s a big minigame and I don’t think but maybe a few people have actually remade it fully that I would make a development thread on it. I’ll also be posting a git repository, meaning it will be released once it’s finished.

All information is gotten from the OSRS wiki found here.

Progress

The red color means the feature has not yet been started.
The orange color means the feature has been started and is under construction.
The green color means the feature has been finished.

Waiting Room:

  • Zamorak
  • Saradomin
  • Guthix portal
  • If wearing god item, change into the correct NPC depending on the portal you entered
  • Correct interface
  • Correct wait time
  • Can only bring in combat items
  • Can’t wear any cape or head gear unless it’s the cloak and hood for your team
  • More to come!

Media
Coming soon!
[/center]

Read full topic
